text: John L. Woolford Jr. is an American biologist currently at Carnegie Mellon University and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. Woolford received his B.A in Chemistry from Rice University in 1971, and his Ph.D. from Duke University in 1976. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:Duke University alumni Category:Brandeis University alumni Category:21st-century American biologists
title: John L. Woolford Jr.
